title: Bootleg Dino Game Wrapper
blurb: Enhanced Chrome dinosaur game with custom features and styling
overview: Created an enhanced version of Chrome's offline dinosaur game with additional features, custom graphics, and improved gameplay mechanics.

title: ANGL
blurb: Angular-based web application for data visualization and analytics
overview: Built a comprehensive data analytics dashboard using Angular with real-time data processing and interactive visualizations.

title: Spotify Preference Analyst
blurb: Music analytics tool using Spotify Web API for personalized insights
overview: Developed a Python application that analyzes Spotify listening habits and provides personalized music recommendations.

title: Box RSS Twitter Bot
blurb: Automated social media bot for company RSS feed integration
overview: Built an automated Twitter bot that monitors Box company RSS feeds and posts relevant updates with smart filtering.

title: Davidson Class Add/Drop Notifier
blurb: Chrome extension for Davidson College course registration notifications
overview: Created a Chrome extension to notify Davidson College students when spots open in desired classes during registration periods.
